import numpy as np

N = 100000
x = np.random.uniform(-1., 1., size=N)
y = np.random.uniform(-1., 1., size=N)
n = np.sum(x**2. + y**2 < 1.)
pi = 4. * n / N
print(f"pi estimate: {pi:.2f}")
